title: Drawing, "Index Peak, Clark's Fork, Wyoming", 1892
medium: Brush and watercolor, white gouache,  graphite on wove blue-green wove paper
markings: Recto: Stamped in ink,  lower left: Museum for the Arts of Decoration Cooper Union [Lugt 457d]
signed: Signed with monogram and dated in pen and black ink, lower left: TM / l892; and again in graphite, lower right: 1892...TM.
inscribed: Inscribed in pen and black ink, lower left: Index Peak, Clark's Fork, Wyoming; in graphite, lower right: l892/Index Peak. Wyoming/ Clark's Fork. TM; color and drawing notations in graphite throughout; in graphite, upper left corner: 17.
description: Horizontal view of a pointed rock peak in the middle distance, placed just left of center on the sheet. Brown jagged rocks surrounds white highlighted peak. In the foreground, small green shrubs and rocks rendered in graphite. White gouache sky behind peak.

exhibitions.title: Frederic Church, Winslow Homer & Thomas Moran: Tourism and the American Landscape

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Index Peak, Clark's Fork, Wyoming", 1892.
1892. Brush and watercolor, white gouache,  graphite on wove blue-green wove paper. Gift of Thomas Moran. 1917-17-69.
